text: Paul Adegboyega Olawoore (30 November 1961 â€“ 1 January 2022) was a Nigerian Roman Catholic prelate. He was bishop of Ilorin from 2019 until his death in 2022. He was born in Nigeria. He was made a priest in 1992. In December 2021, Adegboyega Olawoore was said to have been in bad health. He died on 1 January 2022 in Ilorin, Nigeria at the age of 60. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Nigerian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Paul Adegboyega Olawoore
